UPDATE device_alarm_type
ch4_gas_status = #{ch4GasStatus},
device_bat_vol_status = #{deviceBatVolStatus},
well_lid_bat_vol_status = #{wellLidBatVolStatus},
well_lid_status = #{wellLidStatus},

SELECT t.id, t.device_num AS deviceNum, t.location, t.alarm_type AS alarmType, t.alarm_description AS alarmDescription, t.apply_status AS applyStatus, t.apply_time AS applyTime, t.apply_user AS applyUser, t.alarm_time AS alarmTime FROM device_alarm_detail t
